alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Chariton; Linn; Livingston (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 14 at 10:09AM CDT until August 15 at 1:07PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Grand River near Sumner affecting Chariton, Livingston, Linn MO and Carroll Counties. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Grand River near Sumner. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Bottomland 1 to 2 miles south of the gage begins to flood. At 26.0 feet, Rural land adjacent to the river is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Monday the stage was 26.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will hover around flood stage the next several hours and drop below flood stage this afternoon. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Obs Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Mon Tue 1pm 7pm 1am Grand River Sumner 26.0 26.0 Mon 9am 26.0 25.5 24.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
